hints.title: Antichain-Surface Convergence (Main Result - Corrected)
hints.content:
1694: :label: thm-antichain-surface-main
1695: 
1696: Consider the Fragile Gas at QSD with spatial density $\rho_{\text{spatial}}(x) \propto \sqrt{\det g(x)} \exp(-U_{\text{eff}}/T)$ from {prf:ref}`thm-qsd-spatial-riemannian-volume`.
1697: 
1698: Let $A \subset \mathcal{X}$ be a spatial region with smooth boundary $\partial A$, and let $\gamma_A$ be the **minimal separating antichain** in the CST.
1699: 
1700: Then in the continuum limit $N \to \infty$:
1701: 
1702: $$
1703: \lim_{N \to \infty} \frac{|\gamma_A|}{N^{(d-1)/d}} = C_d \int_{\partial A_{\min}} \left[\rho_{\text{spatial}}(x)\right]^{(d-1)/d} \, d\Sigma(x)
1704: $$
1705: 
1706: where:
1707: - $\partial A_{\min}$ is the surface minimizing the **effective area functional** $\mathcal{A}_{\text{eff}}(\Sigma) = \int_\Sigma [\rho_{\text{spatial}}]^{(d-1)/d} d\Sigma$, homologous to $\partial A$
1708: - $C_d$ is a dimension-dependent geometric constant
1709: - **Key**: $\partial A_{\min}$ minimizes a *weighted* area (incorporating density), not necessarily the standard Riemannian area
1710: 
1711: **Error bound (dimension-dependent)**: For $N$ walkers, the approximation satisfies:
1712: 
1713: $$
1714: \left| \frac{|\gamma_A|}{N^{(d-1)/d}} - C_d \int_{\partial A_{\min}} \left[\rho_{\text{spatial}}(x)\right]^{(d-1)/d} \, d\Sigma(x) \right| \le C \cdot \begin{cases}
1715: N^{-(d-1)/(2d)} & d = 2 \\
1716: N^{-1/3} & d = 3 \\
1717: N^{-1/d} & d > 3
1718: \end{cases}
1719: $$
1720: 
1721: where $C$ depends on $\|\rho_{\text{spatial}}\|_{C^2}$ and the curvature of $\partial A_{\min}$. The error bound arises from geometric discretization and statistical fluctuations, with the slowest-converging term dominating in each dimensional regime (see {prf:ref}`lem-surface-riemann-sum` for detailed derivation).
1722: 
1723: **Uniform fitness case**: When $U_{\text{eff}} = \text{const}$ (marginal-stability regime), $\rho_{\text{spatial}}(x) = \rho_0 \sqrt{\det g(x)}$ with constant $\rho_0$:
1724: 
1725: $$
1726: \lim_{N \to \infty} \frac{|\gamma_A|}{N^{(d-1)/d} \rho_0^{(d-1)/d}} = C_d \int_{\partial A_{\min}} \left[\sqrt{\det g(x)}\right]^{(d-1)/d} \, d\Sigma(x)
1727: $$
1728: 
1729: **Simplified uniform density case**: When both $U_{\text{eff}} = \text{const}$ AND $g = I$ (Euclidean flat space):
1730: 
1731: $$

1691: ## 6. Main Theorem: Antichain-Surface Correspondence
1692: 
1693: :::{prf:theorem} Antichain-Surface Convergence (Main Result - Corrected)
1694: :label: thm-antichain-surface-main

1699:

1702: $$

1704: $$
1705: 
1706: where:
1707: - $\partial A_{\min}$ is the surface minimizing the **effective area functional** $\mathcal{A}_{\text{eff}}(\Sigma) = \int_\Sigma [\rho_{\text{spatial}}]^{(d-1)/d} d\Sigma$, homologous to $\partial A$
1708: - $C_d$ is a dimension-dependent geometric constant
1709: - **Key**: $\partial A_{\min}$ minimizes a *weighted* area (incorporating density), not necessarily the standard Riemannian area
1710: 
1711: **Error bound (dimension-dependent)**: For $N$ walkers, the approximation satisfies:
1712: 
1713: $$
1714: \left| \frac{|\gamma_A|}{N^{(d-1)/d}} - C_d \int_{\partial A_{\min}} \left[\rho_{\text{spatial}}(x)\right]^{(d-1)/d} \, d\Sigma(x) \right| \le C \cdot \begin{cases}
1715: N^{-(d-1)/(2d)} & d = 2 \\
1716: N^{-1/3} & d = 3 \\
1717: N^{-1/d} & d > 3
1718: \end{cases}
1719: $$
1720: 
1721: where $C$ depends on $\|\rho_{\text{spatial}}\|_{C^2}$ and the curvature of $\partial A_{\min}$. The error bound arises from geometric discretization and statistical fluctuations, with the slowest-converging term dominating in each dimensional regime (see {prf:ref}`lem-surface-riemann-sum` for detailed derivation).
1722: 
1723: **Uniform fitness case**: When $U_{\text{eff}} = \text{const}$ (marginal-stability regime), $\rho_{\text{spatial}}(x) = \rho_0 \sqrt{\det g(x)}$ with constant $\rho_0$:
1724: 
1725: $$
1726: \lim_{N \to \infty} \frac{|\gamma_A|}{N^{(d-1)/d} \rho_0^{(d-1)/d}} = C_d \int_{\partial A_{\min}} \left[\sqrt{\det g(x)}\right]^{(d-1)/d} \, d\Sigma(x)
1727: $$
1728: 
1729: **Simplified uniform density case**: When both $U_{\text{eff}} = \text{const}$ AND $g = I$ (Euclidean flat space):
1730: 
1731: $$
1732: \lim_{N \to \infty} \frac{|\gamma_A|}{N^{(d-1)/d}} = C_d \rho_0^{(d-1)/d} \, \text{Area}(\partial A_{\min})

1735: 
1736: :::{prf:proof}
1737: **Combine Lemmas 1-4**:
1738: 
1739: **Step 1**: From Lemma {prf:ref}`lem-antichain-concentration`, antichain episodes lie within $O(N^{-1/d})$ of a surface $\Sigma_A$ separating $A$ from $\bar{A}$.
1740: 
1741: **Step 2**: From Lemma {prf:ref}`lem-minimality-via-scutoid`, this surface is the minimal area surface $\Sigma_A = \partial A_{\min}$.
1742: 
1743: **Step 3**: From Lemma {prf:ref}`lem-surface-riemann-sum` (corrected), the number of episodes on $\partial A_{\min}$ converges with the proper normalization:
1744: 
1745: $$
1746: \frac{|\gamma_A|}{N^{(d-1)/d}} \to C_d \int_{\partial A_{\min}} \left[\rho_{\text{spatial}}(x)\right]^{(d-1)/d} \, d\Sigma(x)
1747: $$
1748: 
1749: **Step 4**: The dimension-dependent error bound comes from combining error sources:
1750: - Voronoi cell diameter: $O(N^{-1/d})$ (Lemma {prf:ref}`lem-voronoi-diameter-scaling`)
1751: - Antichain concentration error: $O(N^{-1/d})$ (Lemma {prf:ref}`lem-antichain-concentration`)
1752: - Surface measure approximation error: Dimension-dependent (Lemma {prf:ref}`lem-surface-riemann-sum`):
1753:   * Geometric discretization: $O(N^{-1/d})$
1754:   * Statistical fluctuations: $O(N^{-(d-1)/(2d)})$
1755:   * **Dominant term**: Slowest-converging (smallest exponent)
1756: 
1757: The overall error is determined by the slowest-converging term among all sources:
1758: 
1759: $$
1760: \text{Total Error} = \max\left\{O(N^{-1/d}), O(N^{-(d-1)/(2d)})\right\} = \begin{cases}
1761: O(N^{-(d-1)/(2d)}) & d = 2 \\
1762: O(N^{-1/3}) & d = 3 \\
1763: O(N^{-1/d}) & d > 3
1764: \end{cases}
1765: $$
1766: 
1767: **Uniform fitness case**: When $U_{\text{eff}} = \text{const}$, then $\rho_{\text{spatial}}(x) = \rho_0 \sqrt{\det g(x)}$ with $\rho_0$ constant. The surface integral becomes:
1768: 
1769: $$
1770: \int_{\partial A_{\min}} \left[\rho_0 \sqrt{\det g(x)}\right]^{(d-1)/d} \, d\Sigma(x) = \rho_0^{(d-1)/d} \int_{\partial A_{\min}} \left[\sqrt{\det g(x)}\right]^{(d-1)/d} \, d\Sigma(x)
1771: $$
